This_blueprint_will_be_deleted_out_of_th: The blueprint will be deleted out of the memory of firefox
The blueprint was exported. You can watch them under 'show blueprints'
acclmessage1: The PasswortChanger don't know how to do it at this site. Do you wan't to show it?
acclmessage2: This entry will be deleted out of this list and out of the password manager of firefox.
acclmessage3: The password will be changed automatically if blueprints exists. This happens live at an active tab. Caused by a bug of firefox this can't be done at background.
acclmessage4: You will be navigated autmatically to the form with which you can change your password on your own.
heading_blueprints: These sites are available as blueprints
